external.description: Enable external access from outside the cluster

externalPorts.description: Specify ports to forward from outside the cluster

running.description: Determines if the virtual machine should be running

image.description: The base image for the virtual machine. Allowed values: `ubuntu`, `cirros`, `alpine` and `fedora`

storageClass.description: StorageClass used to store the data

cpu.description: The number of CPU cores allocated to the virtual machine

memory.description: The amount of memory allocated to the virtual machine

disk.description: The size of the disk allocated for the virtual machine

sshKeys.description: List of SSH public keys for authentication. Can be a single key or a list of keys.

cloudInit.description: cloud-init user data config. See cloud-init documentation for more details.
